Title: Create New Task
Description: Verify user can create a new task successfully

Title: Create New Task
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task appears in the board.

Title: Edit Task (Board View)
Description: Verify user can edit a task in Board View
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task

Title: Edit Task (Board View)
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task updates in the board.

Title: Edit Task (Tree View)
Description: Verify user can edit a task in Tree View
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task

Title: Edit Task (Tree View)
Steps: Hover over task row and click 'More' button.

Title: Edit Task (Tree View)
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task updates in list.

Title: Delete Task (Board View)
Description: Verify user can delete a task in Board View
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task

Title: Delete Task (Tree View)
Description: Verify user can delete a task in Tree View
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task

Title: Delete Task (Tree View)
Steps: Hover over task and open menu.

Title: Task Creation Validation
Description: Verify title is required for task creation

Title: Task Creation Validation
Expected Result: Task is NOT created; Modal remains open.

Title: Cancel Task Creation
Description: Verify task creation can be cancelled

Title: Cancel Task Creation
Expected Result: 1. Modal closes.\n2. Task is NOT created.

Title: AI Feature Gating
Description: Verify AI features are gated for unauthenticated users

Title: AI Description Generation
Description: Verify AI can generate task descriptions

Title: Task Search (Special Chars)
Preconditions: User has tasks with special chars

Title: Task Search (No Results)
Description: Verify search behavior with no matches
Expected Result: 1. No tasks displayed.\n2. 'No tasks found' message or empty state.

Title: Filter by Status (Board)
Description: Verify status filtering in Board View

Title: Filter by Status (Tree)
Description: Verify status filtering in Tree View

Title: User Isolation
Description: Verify unauthenticated users cannot see tasks
Expected Result: 1. No tasks visible.\n2. Login prompt or empty state.
